article.title: SRA Awarded $29.9 Million Contract by the U.S. Army
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: SRA International has been awarded a re-compete contract from the U.S. Army. The contract could be worth $29.9 million over five years, if all the options are exercised. SRA will continue to assist in combining into one program the installation support modules contract and the range facility management support system.
